rules_text: When this side is cleared, surveil 1. Draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
rules_text2: Pay 1 life: Create an Aether token. Activate only once each turn. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Draw a card.”)[/i]
